articles.author: Andrei
articles.description:
Algorithmic trading is something that I’m incredibly excited about. So much so that I’ve spent the last 3 years building an algorithmic crypto trading platform alongside a small team of developers. After all this work, I’m supper happy to say that out trading platform — AESIR is live and growing! The app is still very young and […]

articles.author: Andrei
articles.description:
If you’re familiar with the r/CryptoCurrency subreddit, you’ve probably heard the phrase the phrase “inverse r/cc strategy”. This is very similar to the inverse Cramer strategy, in that it aims to place trades using the inverted sentiment of the Cryptocurrency subreddit. Basically, if the subreddit says that Solana sucks — we want to go all in. The […]
The post Open Source Crypto Sentiment Trading Bot for Reddit appeared first on cryptomaton.
articles.title: Open Source Crypto Sentiment Trading Bot for Reddit
